Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Well, I go on a nice trip for 3 days, and come home hearing that somebody i=
s dead.  And just who died?  Minime!  He.........took his own life.  Man, I=
 never really knew him personally, but from what I've seen in his and other=
 peoples' posts, he was a great RPer and a great friend to some of you.  Wh=
y Minime?  Well, I hope he is in a better place now.........

             =
     I wonder who will role-play
                  Fliq,Savage and Gotron
 =
                 For Neo Beast Wars RPG
                  Now that Minime, =
is gone

                   I can still remember
                  When the=
 Alliance fought the Trainers
                   They fought with the Lavac=
ons
                   Astral, Starlight, Recklessa and the others

       =
            You were a great friend
                    To me and to others=

                    But now your soul is resting
                    Under=
 soft and warm covers

                    Me and others will miss you
    =
                 Now that you've departed
                    Except for JP=
, his comment was cruel
                     And also quite retarded

     =
                I am sad to say this...
                     Goodbye Minime=

                     Please, rest in peace
                     And now, f=
orever I will grieve

-Dcoburn 

:( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :(
   
        =
